name: 5v5 - Farm Showdown
description: The ultimate farmer challenge! Face all five farmers in an epic showdown. Choose your 5 strongest fighters to prove your worth against the complete farming crew.

stageEffects.name: Farm Field
stageEffects.description: The battle takes place in an open field. The farmers have the home advantage!

stageEffects.name: Healing Wind
stageEffects.description: A gentle breeze carries healing energy across the battlefield.

firstTimeCompletionReward.message: üéâ For completing the ultimate farmer challenge, you've earned the respect of a random character who wishes to join your cause!
